page.title: 08A day in my life.
page.content: I usually wake up at 6.50a.m.and reach out to switch off my alarm on my digital watch. Iget out of bed quickly so that I don't go back to sleep.Then I open my curtains and switch the light on.After I go for a wash and return to my bedroom to put on my grey school clothes.While I am getting dressed I hear my parents alarm ring in their bedroom. A few minutes later they come into my room and say good morning to me. My dad goes downstairs to start making the breakfast while my mum has a wash.At this time I am left just hanging around so I go into my big brothers bedroom and annoy him for something to do.Sometimes he yells at me and sends me out but at other times he lets me annoy him.By this time it is about 7.20 and I go downstairs for breakfast.
